tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);
